description: Combine the tiles to reach the magic 2048 number. A classic brain teaser.

title: Hextris
description: Fast-paced hexagon matching game. Don't let the bricks reach the top!

title: Google Pacman
description: The world-famous yellow ghost-eater. Originally a Google Doodle.

title: Tower Stack
description: Stack the blocks as perfectly as possible to reach the stars.

title: Wordle
description: Guess the 5-letter word in six tries. The ultimate daily word game.

title: Flappy Bird
description: Test your patience and timing in this legendary difficult arcade game.

title: Slope 3D
description: Endless fast-paced ball rolling game. Don't fall off the neon track.
